content:
made from vintage pattern but has been brought up to date with more terms and explanations added by me supplies 2 ribbon rosettes 1 1/2 yards ribbon 3/4 inch wide steel crochet hook 2/0 double zero baby weight wool yarn 1 ball 3/4 oz also available on my blog if the pdf doesn t work with your computer **if you like my blog and the free patterns and tutorials and want to say thank you i have a wish list on ravelry of patterns i would like to make
thank you in advance for being kind and
saying thank you back

love sunshine but please do not feel like you have to**
